key_items: small speaker character sitting on a blue bed
explanation:

Behind it is a red hoodie speaker character, and a camera character wearing white clothes is standing by the wall. The question asks how many different characters are depicted sitting on beds throughout the video. 

In this segment, only one character is sitting on a bed. There is no indication of any other characters sitting on beds in this frame. The red hoodie character and the camera character are standing, not sitting on beds. 

Given the options, Option D (One character is sitting on beds) aligns with the current observation. There is no evidence in this segment to suggest more than one character is sitting on a bed.
</think>
<answer>D</answer>
